user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: User Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
epics.summary: Implement secure and compliant multi-factor authentication for portal access.
epics.description: Develop a secure authentication module enabling customers to log in using multi-factor authentication. Integrate with existing identity management and security frameworks of the bank. The login process should include password verification, one-time passcodes, and optional biometric methods. Ensure the module is compliant with regulatory standards for banking security and privacy, and capable of handling future enhancements like adaptive authentication.

epics.title: Personalized User Dashboard
epics.summary: Design a dashboard that presents personalized banking information based on user profile.
epics.description: Create a dynamic user dashboard that displays relevant banking products, account summaries, and services tailored to the individual’s profile and eligibility. This dashboard should have an intuitive user interface, quick navigation panels, and visual indicators for pending actions or messages. It should prioritize personalization and responsiveness for different device types, providing customers with easy access to operations such as view account details, initiate transactions, and manage service requests.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Enable customers to initiate and manage account opening and service modification requests.
epics.description: Develop guided workflows to facilitate new account creation, account upgrades, and service modification requests with minimal clicks. Each workflow should validate user input, manage document uploads, and track progress in real time. Integrate with the bank’s internal systems for automatic routing to approval teams, ensuring seamless back-office coordination and compliance with internal service-level agreements.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Updates and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide customers with real-time updates and notification services.
epics.description: Implement a real-time status tracking system that provides instant visibility into the progress of submitted requests. Integrate event-driven notifications to alert users via email and portal messages whenever their transactions or service requests reach critical milestones. Ensure all updates are synchronized with the workflow engine and core banking services for accuracy and timeliness.

epics.title: Interaction History and Activity Logs
epics.summary: Record and display a full history of all user interactions and requests.
epics.description: Develop a module to capture and maintain an auditable history of user activities such as request submissions, document uploads, and communications. Provide an accessible timeline view within the customer’s portal where they can review past actions. Partner this functionality with administrative logs to support compliance auditing and operational insights.

epics.title: Document Upload and Secure Storage
epics.summary: Enable customers to upload and securely store documents within the portal.
epics.description: Build a secure document management system that allows users to upload identity verification and support documents for account and service requests. Establish encryption for storage and transfer, ensuring all regulatory data privacy requirements are met. The system should validate document types, manage metadata, and integrate securely with core banking document repositories.

epics.title: Save and Resume Application Functionality
epics.summary: Allow users to save incomplete applications and continue later.
epics.description: Implement a persistence mechanism that enables users to save progress during application and service request workflows. Allow drafts to be loaded and continued smoothly at a later time or on another device. Provide visual indicators showing saved states, last modified date, and required steps to complete applications to support flexible yet efficient interactions.

epics.title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface
epics.summary: Create a responsive portal optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
epics.description: Design the portal with responsive front-end design using modern frameworks to provide a consistent user experience across devices and browsers. Ensure accessibility standards such as WCAG compliance are met. Implement mobile-first design principles that optimize performance and readability while allowing quick and easy navigation of essential banking functions.

epics.title: Integration with Core Banking System and Database
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with core banking systems and a dedicated database layer.
epics.description: Establish reliable API connections between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking infrastructure. Implement a dedicated portal database to handle customer sessions, request statuses, and cached data to improve performance. Manage integration through secure API gateways and middleware for efficient and fault-tolerant communication with existing systems.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Implement role-based access and permission management for the portal.
epics.description: Design and configure role-based access control that defines permissions for different user categories such as customers, employees, and administrators. Ensure that customers only see services relevant to their role and authorization level. Provide tools to manage user roles dynamically as business rules change, maintaining a secure environment that prevents data exposure across roles.

epics.title: Data Protection and Portal Security
epics.summary: Establish a comprehensive data security and protection framework.
epics.description: Incorporate layers of security into the system architecture including encryption, intrusion detection, and continuous vulnerability assessment. Protect sensitive financial data through encryption in transit and at rest, secure session handling, and implementation of role-based authentication checks. Regularly audit the system for adherence to data privacy regulations and security standards.

epics.title: Performance Optimization and Reliability
epics.summary: Optimize system performance to ensure scalability and reliability.
epics.description: Develop a performance tuning strategy for achieving high availability and scalability under increased load. Implement load balancing, caching strategies, and health monitoring for critical modules. Continuously analyze key performance metrics and tune database and API interactions to ensure the portal remains responsive and available to users at all times.

user_stories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to secure my account with multi-factor authentication, so that I can ensure that only I can access my account.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integrate OTP and biometric authentication options.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. OTP and biometric authentication methods are available.
2. Users are prompted for a second factor during login.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user configured with MFA, When they attempt to login, Then they should be prompted for OTP or biometric authentication.

user_stories.title: Enforce Password Policies
user_stories.description: As a user, I want enforced password policies, so that I can ensure my account is secure from unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Enforce strong password requirements and expiration.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Passwords must meet defined complexity requirements.
2. Passwords expire after set durations prompting users to update.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user setting a password, When they create/update their password, Then it should meet the defined complexity and expiration requirements.

user_stories.title: Implement Session Management
user_stories.description: As a user, I want secure session management, so that my active sessions are secure and protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement secure session creation and handling.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Sessions are created securely when users login.
2. Sessions timeout appropriately after inactivity.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user logged in, When there is inactivity, Then their session should timeout after a set duration.

user_stories.title: Encrypt Sensitive Data
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my sensitive data encrypted, so that my private information remains secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Encrypt sensitive user data in transit and at rest.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. All sensitive data is encrypted in transit.
2. All sensitive data is encrypted at rest.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user data, When it is stored or transmitted, Then it should be encrypted following security standards.

user_stories.title: Ensure Compliance with Financial Security Standards
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want the system to comply with PCI DSS and GDPR, so that customer data is protected and the organization avoids penalties.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure all authentication mechanisms comply with PCI DSS and GDPR.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. All security mechanisms comply with PCI DSS and GDPR requirements.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a system handling user data, When it undergoes compliance checks, Then it should meet PCI DSS and GDPR requirements.

user_stories.title: Provide Account Overview
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want an overview of my accounts on my dashboard, so that I can easily monitor my finances.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Display all user accounts with balance and status.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The dashboard shows all accounts accurately.
2. Balances and account statuses are updated in real-time.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer with multiple accounts, When they view their dashboard, Then they should see all their accounts with real-time balance and status.

user_stories.title: Personalized Content and Recommendations
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want personalized content and recommendations on my dashboard, so that I can access services that are relevant to me.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Tailor content and product recommendations based on user profile and history.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Recommendations are based on user profile and history.
2. Content dynamically adjusts based on user interactions.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user's profile and interaction history, When they access the dashboard, Then they should receive personalized content and recommendations.

user_stories.title: Quick Access Widgets
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want quick access to key actions through widgets, so that I can perform important tasks efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Include widgets for actions like viewing balances and applying for products.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Widgets provide single-click access to key actions.
2. Widget options align with user needs and usage patterns.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user on the dashboard, When they use widgets, Then they should be able to perform key actions efficiently.

user_stories.title: Responsive Design for Multiple Devices
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a responsive design that works across devices, so that I can have a seamless experience whether I'm on my desktop, tablet, or mobile.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Design UI elements that adapt to different screen sizes.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. UI adjusts seamlessly across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
2. User experience remains consistent across devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user accessing from different devices, When they use the interface, Then it should render correctly on all devices.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Guided Account Opening Workflow
user_stories.description: As a potential customer, I want guided workflows for account opening, so that I can easily submit my information and documents.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Create guided steps to assist with account opening, including dynamic forms and secure document upload.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Steps guide the user through the account opening process.
2. User can upload documents securely.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a potential customer, When they open an account, Then they should be guided through steps and able to upload documents securely.

user_stories.title: Real-Time Status Tracking
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to track the status of my requests in real-time, so that I can stay informed on their progress.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement status updates for each request and display in real-time.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Real-time updates for each request's status are displayed.
2. Customers can view the current status and history of their requests.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer request, When the status changes, Then the update should be reflected in real-time in their dashboard.

user_stories.title: Integration with Core Banking APIs
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to integrate with the core banking system APIs, so that I can exchange data securely between the portal and the bank's systems.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Develop secure APIs for data exchange.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Data exchanged between the portal and banking systems is synchronized securely.
2. API calls are optimized and reliable.
user_stories.test_cases: Given data changes, When they are exchanged via APIs, Then the data should be synchronized and secured.

user_stories.title: Define User Roles and Permissions
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to define roles and permissions, so that I can control access to resources based on user authorization levels.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Create and assign roles with specific permissions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Roles and permissions can be defined and assigned.
2. Users access resources as per their roles.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user roles, When accessing resources, Then permissions should enforce as per the role definitions.

user_stories.epic_title: Audit Trail and Interaction History Module
user_stories.title: Capture and Display Interaction History
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a detailed history of interactions, so that I can review all activities performed on my account.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Record and display all significant user interactions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. All user interactions are recorded.
2. Interaction histories are displayed transparently.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When viewing their interaction history, Then all significant activities should be recorded and displayed accurately.

architecture_generation.description: Architecture designed for a self-service banking portal utilizing Azure services for security, performance, and a seamless user experience across devices.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture has been enhanced to address critical security and reliability issues by introducing Azure Web Application Firewall (WAF) and implementing a multi-region disaster recovery plan for databases. Operational excellence, performance efficiency, and cost optimization recommendations have been noted for future improvements. The updated architecture ensures a more secure, reliable, and scalable self-service banking portal.
